item.title: People2People Website
item.dc:creator: mohan
item.description:
People2People is a job portal website with plain looks design. However application is build in different platform. This is just basic website that build with WordPress with simple job portal function such as Job List, Job Apply etc. Tool/Resource WordPress HTML5 CSS3 Bootstrap Owl Carousel FontAwesome Visit Website

item.content:encoded:
